english.segment1: Theres a man on the roof. Ignoring the fireworks. The city walks by unmoved. Their laughter looks like tears
english.segment2: On top of a skyscraper. With a foundation of fears. Hopes deferred and dreams (Proverbs 13:12). He thinks cant come true
english.segment3: The city keeps hurting him. He crawls to it for medicine. All the answers are here. Hes asking the wrong questions
english.segment4: On top of a skyscraper. With a foundation of fears. Empty works and dreams. He thinks cant come true. For what can he do?. What has he to offer to You?
english.segment5: Your Majesty, hes jumping. Hes jumping
